column4: I find that in 10.04 I have the su command and none of my passwords work with it.  1) Is su officially supported now?  2)  Why don't my passwords work?
yes I know but my questions still stand
I made fresh install of natty and pae was installed by default
next question : does your uname -a output include the letters pae?

I'm not on Ubuntu comp right noe but yes when I boot only options are with pae kernel
we discus thing witch can be solved in min time why

leave that partition and install Windows first then Ubuntu
